page.title: 08PENICUIK PRIMARY SCHOOLS
page.content: {Mauricewood,semi-open-plan -built 1972 Its present roll is{420 pupils}with 17 class teachers,7 visiting teachers or specialist teachers,1 janitor,5 kitchen staff and 7 cleaners. Attached to the school is the{Carnethy {Community Centre}which has a full-time secretary and community officer. Their activities include a fly-tying club, young musician practice and keep fit. The centre has a hall and coffee lounge.Only part of this school is in our block. { {Sacred Heart, open-plan -built 1976 This is the catholic school for Penicuik.It has 114 pupils and 6 class teachers which includes the headteacher. In the evenings there are Brownies and on a Wednesday there is The Happy Club which is a club for mentally handicapped children of any denomination.
